description.value: Your stratagems benefit from your precise knowledge of anatomy. When you critically hit with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Devise a Stratagem]{Devising a Strategem}, if your attack dealt piercing or slashing damage, you also deal @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success] to your target.
